{"step_by_step_thinking": "Based on the information provided in the documents, we can determine the storage temperatures of RBC, Platelet, and Fresh Frozen Plasma (FFP). According to Document [1], platelets are stored at room temperature (20-22°C) with agitation. Document [3] states that whole blood can be stored at 22°C for up to 24 hours. Document [4] mentions that fresh frozen plasma (FFP) is stored at -30°C. Therefore, the correct answer is option C: RBC 20-22°C, Platelet 2-6°C, FFP -30°C.", "answer_choice": "C"}
